comment: Locations of sites not used in power CU floorplan (PL_INVALID) are defined per site type and per SLR.
Provide a single site (<x0>,<y0>) or a site rectangle defined by bottom left (<x1>,<y1>) and top right (<x2>,<y2>) corners:
Here is an example of one single site and one rectangle per site type per available SLR

SLR_1.comment: Leave some room for the BLD routing to bleed into ULP
Leave some room for the BLD routing to bleed into ULP
